faq.pageSubtitle: Everything you need to know about AI voice agents and phone AI
faq.description: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our AI voice agents and automated telephony. If your question isn't answered, please feel free to contact us directly.
faq.question1: What is an AI voice agent?
faq.answer1: An AI voice agent is an intelligent voice assistant based on artificial intelligence that is capable of conducting phone conversations, answering customer inquiries, and automating processes. Unlike traditional voice dialog systems, AI voice agents can conduct natural conversations, understand complex concerns, and independently offer solutions.
faq.question2: How does callflows' phone AI work?
faq.answer2: callflows' phone AI uses advanced artificial intelligence to conduct natural conversations. It understands concerns, can book appointments, provide information, and handle complex tasks - all over the phone. The AI is specifically trained on your business processes and can seamlessly integrate into your existing systems. It works around the clock and can handle multiple conversations simultaneously.
faq.question3: Which companies are callflows suitable for?
faq.answer3: AI voice agents are suitable for companies of all sizes looking to make their customer communication more efficient. They are particularly suitable for customer service, sales, marketing, and HR processes. Whether small business or large corporation - the solution scales with your requirements and can be adapted to various industries.
faq.question4: What does an AI voice agent cost?
faq.answer4: The costs for an AI voice agent at callflows are based on a minute-based billing model. Prices vary depending on the package and minute volume. There are no hidden costs or basic fees - you only pay for actual usage. For individual requirements, we offer customized solutions.
faq.question5: Can an AI voice agent be integrated into existing systems?
faq.answer5: Yes, callflows' AI voice agents can seamlessly integrate into existing CRM systems, calendar systems, and other business applications to ensure smooth information exchange. Integration happens via APIs and webhooks and is fully managed by our team.
faq.question6: How natural does an AI voice agent sound?
faq.answer6: callflows' AI voice agents sound extraordinarily natural and are barely distinguishable from human conversation partners. They understand context, can respond to follow-up questions, and conduct fluid conversations. Voices are specifically selected for your brand and can be customized in tonality and speaking style.
faq.question7: How long does setting up an AI voice agent take?
faq.answer7: Setting up an AI voice agent typically takes 2-4 weeks, depending on the complexity of your requirements. The process includes analyzing your business processes, configuring the agent, integrating into your systems, and thorough testing. Our team accompanies you throughout the entire process and ensures the agent is optimally tailored to your needs.
faq.question8: Which languages do the AI voice agents support?
faq.answer8: Currently, our AI voice agents support German and English. Additional languages are planned and can be implemented upon request. Agents can also be set up multilingually and automatically detect the caller's language.
faq.answer9: Data protection has the highest priority at callflows. All data is processed in accordance with GDPR and stored on servers within the EU. We implement state-of-the-art security measures such as encryption, access controls, and regular security audits. Detailed information can be found in our privacy policy.
faq.question10: What distinguishes callflows from other providers?
faq.answer10: callflows stands out through the combination of advanced AI technology and personal support. We don't offer a standard solution, but develop a customized solution together with you that perfectly fits your company. Our AI voice agents are particularly natural in conversation and can handle complex tasks independently. We also offer a transparent pricing model with no hidden costs.
faq.answer11: To use a callflows AI voice agent, you only need an internet connection and a phone system. We support all common telephone systems (VoIP, ISDN, SIP) and can also provide cloud-based solutions. Integration happens via standardized interfaces, so no special technical knowledge is required.
faq.question12: Can the AI voice agent also handle complex inquiries?
faq.answer12: Yes, our AI voice agents are designed to handle complex and multi-step inquiries. They can store context information, ask follow-up questions when needed, and even initiate escalation processes. If an inquiry exceeds the agent's capabilities, it is seamlessly transferred to a human employee.
faq.answer13: Quality is ensured through continuous machine learning and regular optimizations. All conversations are evaluated (naturally in compliance with data protection) to improve performance. Additionally, we offer detailed analytics and reporting tools so you can monitor your AI voice agent's performance at any time.
faq.question14: Is there a test phase or pilot project?
faq.answer14: Yes, we offer a pilot month in which the system is created for you. This phase lasts 1 month. During this time, you can test the functions of our AI voice agent without obligation.
